title: Get The System Directory Of Windows
description: Obtain The Address Of The Windows System Directory Folder
longDescription:
获取Windows的系统目录文件夹地址

Obtain The Address Of The Windows System Directory Folder


参数类型说明：

Parameter Type Description:

  • Desktop : <desktop> 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Desktop/)

  • Programs : Start Menu/Programs 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/)

  • Favorites : <user name>/Favorites

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Favorites/)

  • Startup : Start Menu/Programs/Startup 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Startup/)

  • Recent : <user name>/Recent

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Recent/)

  • SendTo : <user name>/SendTo

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/SendTo/)

  • StartMenu : <user name>/Start Menu

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/)

  • MyDocuments : My Documents

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Documents/)

  • MyMusic : My Music folder 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Music/)

  • MyVideo : My Videos folder 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Videos/)

  • DesktopDirectory : <user name>/Desktop 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Desktop/)

  • Nethood : <user name>/nethood 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Network Shortcuts/)

  • Fonts : windows/fonts

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/Fonts/)

  • Templates :  windows templates

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Templates/)

  • CommonStartmenu : All Users/Start Menu 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/)

  • CommonPrograms : All Users/Start Menu/Programs 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/)

  • CommonStartup : All Users/Startup 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Startup/)

  • CommonDesktopDirectory : All Users/Desktop 

(e.g., C:/Users/Public/Desktop/)

  • Appdata : <user name>/Application Data

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/)

  • PrintHood : <user name>/PrintHood

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Printer Shortcuts/)

  • LocalAppdata : <user name>/Local Settings/Applicaiton Data (non roaming) 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/)

  • Altstartup : non localized startup 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Startup/)

  • CommonAltstartup : non localized common startup 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Startup/)

  • CommonFavorites :  favorites

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Favorites/)

  • InternetCache :  internet cache

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/INetCache/)

  • Cookies : internet cookies

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/INetCookies/)

  • History :  windows history

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/History/)

  • CommonAppdata : All Users/Application Data 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/)

  • Windows : Windows Directory

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/)

  • System : System Directory 

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/system32/)

  • ProgramFiles : C:/Program Files 

(e.g., C:/Program Files/)

  • MyPictures : C:/Program Files/My Pictures 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/Pictures/)

  • Profile : USERPROFILE 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/)

  • System x86 : x86 system directory on RISC

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/SysWOW64/)

  • Program Files x86 : x86 C:/Program Files on RISC 

(e.g., C:/Program Files (x86)/)

  • Program Files Common : C:/Program Files/Common 

(e.g., C:/Program Files/Common Files/)

  • Program Files Common x86 : x86 Program Files/Common on RISC 

(e.g., C:/Program Files (x86)/Common Files/)

  • CommonTemplates : All Users/Templates

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Templates/)

  • CommonDocuments : All Users/Documents 

(e.g., C:/Users/Public/Documents/)

  • CommonAdmintools : All Users/Start Menu/Programs/Administrative Tools 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Administrative Tools/)

  • Admintools : <user name>/Start Menu/Programs/Administrative Tools 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Roaming/Microsoft/Windows/Start Menu/Programs/Administrative Tools/)

  • CommonMusic : All Users/My Music 

(e.g., C:/Users/Public/Music/)

  • CommonPictures : All Users/My Pictures 

(e.g., C:/Users/Public/Pictures/)

  • CommonVideo : All Users/My Video 

(e.g., C:/Users/Public/Videos/)

  • Resources : Resource Direcotry 

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/resources/)

  • ResourcesLocalized : Localized Resource Direcotry 

(e.g., C:/WINDOWS/resources/0804/)

  • CommonOemLinks : Links to All Users OEM specific apps 

(e.g., C:/ProgramData/OEM Links/)

  • CdburnArea : USERPROFILE/Local Settings/Application Data/Microsoft/CD Burning 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Burn/Burn/)

  • Temp : System Temp Path 

(e.g., C:/Users/UserName/AppData/Local/Temp/)
technicalDetails:
Features: DT System Directory

  • Get System Directory

Code Modules:

  • Runtime ：DTSystemDirectory


Number of Blueprints: 1

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64
